name: BladderCancerStagingTisForUrologyCare
title: Bladder Cancer staging Tis for Urology Care
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The staging is for the Primary Tumor (T) as related to bladder cancer.  This is a Carcinoma in situ: "flat tumor".),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a Tis bladder cancer which is nonmuscle invasive.),(Inclusion Criteria: Tis nonmuscle invasive bladder cancer),(Exclusion Criteria: Any Primary Tumor (T) stage other than Tis)

concept.display: Tis: Carcinoma in situ ("flat tumor" of urinary bladder) (finding)
